title: Network Topologies
subject: Computer Networks
theory:
Physical layout of nodes.
- **Bus**: Single cable. Cheap. Single point of failure.
- **Star**: Central Hub. Robust. Expensive (Switch).
- **Mesh**: n(n-1)/2 links. Reliable. Costly.
- **Ring**: Token passing.

common_mistakes.correction: Mesh is too expensive for LANs. Star is the standard for Office LANs.

interview_questions.question: Which topology requires most cabling?
interview_questions.answer: Mesh Topology (Every node connected to every other).
